title: About zoos
creator_credit: Christine Z Wiser, Harry Rasky, N. H. Cominos and Films Incorporated
brief_description: Edited from the 1970 television special titled Zoos of the world. Explains that modern zoos around the world provide many services for animals, including places where they can graze, dig, climb, swim and sleep with protection and with nursery and medical care. Suitable for lower and upper primary levels.
